title: How can i change EUNE language from English to German?
body: I want to change the language from English to German. Does anybody know how i can do that?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, German is not a *supported language* on the EUNE region. German is only supported on the EUW region, as per our [**Game Language guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).

If you have any other questions, let me know.
